title: Check_EV_Properties.R — Check_EV_Properties
text: Uses COM objects run Echoview get transducer properties.  properties saved .csv file Data_Compile_dir DirNameFile excel spreadsheet. name defaults TransducerConfigCheck(SurveyName).csv works EV files ek5 sub-directory . ek5 subdirectory must named 'ek5 EV'

title: Check_EV_Properties.R — Check_EV_Properties
code: Check_EV_Properties(SurveyName, DirNameFile, variables, sheet = case, Xnum = 2)

title: Check_EV_Properties.R — Check_EV_Properties
text: SurveyName name survey excel file DirNameFile excel file name paths variables - variables export sheet optional argument denote sheet DirNameFile want use. defaults first sheet set. Xnum - transducer number.  Defaults 2 (often 38 kHz) database optional argument export format.  Default database (1).  Spreadsheet =0

what: SetExpParamsFun - function to set the export parameters in Echoview given an Echoview export object — SetExpParamsFun
title: SetExpParamsFun - function to set the export parameters in Echoview given an Echoview export object — SetExpParamsFun
text: Function take EvFile Export object set export parameters within . Parameters export come ToExport. Parameters export come NoExport

title: SetExpParamsFun - function to set the export parameters in Echoview given an Echoview export object — SetExpParamsFun
SetExpParamsFun - function to set the export parameters in Echoview given an Echoview export object — SetExpParamsFun
text: Obj_ExpVar- Evfile export object form EVfile[['Properties']][['Export']][['Variables']]

title: export_integration_EVdir — export_integration_EVdir
text: function export integration variables set EV files. two excel files inputs (paths, parameters export).  exports go directory automatically named date.  directory export directory listed DirNameFile.  EVfile saved process. works EV files ek5 sub-directory . ek5 subdirectory must named 'ek5 EV'

title: export_integration_EVdir — export_integration_EVdir
code: export_integration_EVdir(   Survey_Name,   DirNameFile,   variables,   paramnamefile = NA,   ni = 1,   gdepth = 10,   database = 1,   sheet,   datedir = 1,   ... )

title: export_integration_EVdir — export_integration_EVdir
text: DirNameFile excel file name paths variables - variables export paramnamefile optional excel file name parameters export export. column ToExport parameters export.  column NoExport parameters export ni optional argument file start (default ni=1 first file). defaults 1 (EV files) gdepth optional argument cell depth.  gdepth defaults 10 m database optional argument export format.  Default database (1).  Spreadsheet =0 sheet optional argument denote sheet DirNameFile want use. defaults first sheet set. datedir Flag state whether create use separate date sub-directory redoing exports, originals get overwritten. defaults using date sub-directory (datedir=1 default; make date directory. datedir=0 create sub-directory) SurveyName name survey excel file

title: getTnumv2.R — getTnumv1
text: Function pull transect number standard exported csv convention V###-S#####-X#-F38-T##-Z0- ( ).csv number V vessel, S survey number, X transducer, F frequency (generally 38 kHz), T transect number

title: getTnumv2.R — getTnumv1
text: : string name EV file

title: getTnumv2.R — getTnumv2

what: read_EV_exports: Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EVdir_exports
title: read_EV_exports: Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EVdir_exports
text: Read directory .csv files (can several variables) exported Echoview.   function preserves cells depth. Uses packages readxl, readr, purrr, dplyr.

title: read_EV_exports: Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EVdir_exports
code: read_EVdir_exports(   SurveyName,   DirNameFile,   database = 1,   exportloc = 1,   sheet = NULL,   hakeflag = 2,   ... )

title: read_EV_exports: Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EVdir_exports
text: SurveyName - name survey DirNameFile excel file - contains paths locations files. Uses Export_dir directory exported files . database optional argument format .csv files .  Default database (1).  Spreadsheet =0 exportloc optional argument using Export_Dir Region_Export_dir column entry DirNameFile spreadsheet.  1 Export_Dir, 0 Region_Export_dir sheet optional argument denote sheet DirNameFile want use. defaults first sheet set. hakeflag sets whether specific "hake"-type classes kept.  hakeflag=0 keeps just age-0 hake, hakeflag=1 keeps just age-1 hake, hakeflag=2 keeps just regular age2+ hake, hakeflag=3 keeps everything possibly hake.  numbers (including -1) keep everything regardless whether hake. default hakeflag=2, keeping just adult hake.

title: read_EV_exports: Read in a directory of .csv files exported from Echoview — read_EVdir_exports
code: temp<-read_EV_exports(SurveyName, DirNameFile,database=1,exportloc=1) #> Error in read_EV_exports(SurveyName, DirNameFile, database = 1, exportloc = 1): could not find function "read_EV_exports"

repath_EVdir_flex.R — repath_EVdir_flex
text: Function take directory EV files reset path. works EV files ek5 sub-directory . ek5 subdirectory must named 'ek5 EV'.  EK5_Dir_Flag must  set appropriately excel file. Written RT 2022, modified 2024. Requires excel file input says paths row survey (survey_name), column path file name

title: repath_EVdir_flex.R — repath_EVdir_flex
text: SurveyName name survey excel file DirNameFile excel file name paths Excel file following columns (header names) Cal_File: calibration file name Base_Path: Orig_EV_Dir: Raw_Dir EK5_Dir_Flag EK5_Raw_Dir ni optional argument file start (default ni=1 first file). sheet optional argument denote sheet DirNameFile

title: repath_EVdir_flex.R — repath_EVdir_flex
code: if (FALSE) { DirNameFile="C:/rthomas/R/Rcode/EK60_EK80 conversion/EK60_Ek80_conv_updated/Directory Structure EK60 EK80 conversion updated.xlsx" SurveyName='2019_US' repath_EVdir(SurveyName,DirNameFile) }
